rows.label: qst701709_msg0001
rows.name: What is it? Did you find his trail?

rows.label: qst701709_msg0002
rows.name: ...Yes. But it might be a mistake...

rows.label: qst701709_msg0003
rows.name:
A mistake? Could it be...
an acquaintance of yours?

rows.label: qst701709_msg0005
rows.name:
It's Dio, the handyman.
You know him, don't you?

rows.label: qst701709_msg0007
rows.name:
But he didn't kill your sister!
In fact, it's the opposite...

rows.label: qst701709_msg0010
rows.name:
I'm sorry, I made you
play the bad guy...

rows.label: qst701709_msg0011
rows.name:
Don't worry about it. If
I hadn't, Shin would have
likely attacked him.

rows.label: qst701709_msg0012
rows.name: You don't need to be so considerate.

rows.label: qst701709_msg0013
rows.name:
Come on, that kind of
attitude isn't good.

rows.label: qst701709_msg0015
rows.name:
Anyway, let's go too. He must
have headed for Dio's place.
